c74object.name: crow.volts
c74object.digest: Set CV output values on crow
c74object.description: Connect to the crow object to automatically generate CV values on the crow eurorack module.

objarg.name: OutputIndex
objarg.digest: Hardware output to set to voltage

method.name: list
method.description: The first number specifies a target value, and the second number specifies a total amount of time (in seconds); crow slews the selected output to the target in the specified amount of time.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Slew the specified output to the target.
method.description: In left inlet: Slew the specified output to the target.
